Deborah K. Lewis is a Professor in the College of Computer Studies (CCS) at PDM or Pambayang Dalubhasaan ng Marilao.

- She is a teaching faculty member.
- Her employment status is contractual.
- Her email address is deborah.lewis@teacher.edu.ph.
- Her contact number is 09343614019.
